attributes.title: chettooooo man
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I’m 14 and I need to know if I should vote for the orange man. All I saw on this app was chetttoooo man and he came to me casa a personally asulted by oranges and said they were deported. I am very disappointed because I liked that orange and chettttooo man made me pay for his spray tan. I am sad now 😔

attributes.title: WROST APP EVER
attributes.review: I installed the app a few days ago and It started messing up my phone and the cache from the app had photos and  somehow, saved it on my gallery. The photos contained Donald Trump's nudes!!! I've never seen a dick look like a shriveled up McDonalds Nugget in my life!!! If I could, I would rate it 0 stars 😡😡

attributes.title: Trump = dumb
attributes.review: This app is extremely awful. I don’t think people should download this because I don’t think people  need to hear a stupid mans words. Trump is not a wise man and disrespects anyone against him. He should not be president, and not be able to have his own app

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: When I tried to open the app it kept closing then my phone froze and rebooted. This happened every single time. When I tried to delete the app it kept saying error I guess this app is as useless as the president

attributes.title: Beyond horrible
attributes.review: Slow, doesn’t load correctly, says weird things at weird times, doesn’t stay up to date with current news trends. 0/10 wouldn’t recommend this app or this president.

attributes.title: Trash app
attributes.review: I quite literally have had the worst experience with this app for the time I owned it. My president 🗽 is a good man who deserves better. It bugs out whenever I open it. It's slow and the rewards system is trash. 🤢 Please don't waste any data on it. Tump 2020🇺🇸🙏✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APPLICATION
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app i have ever used it took nearly 38 hours to download and the first thing me and my friends saw when we opened it was trump full nu*e and i will never unsee that overall horrible experience and should be deleted from the app store.

attributes.title: If I could give this 0 stars I would
attributes.review: I would have to say that this is probably the WORST app on the App Store and I deeply regret downloading it at all. Fully sport all efforts to remove this from the App Store and believe the world would be a better place with it gone

attributes.title: Super slow and glitchy
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to using this app to track the best, strongest, most racist president ever but it took forever to download and the instructions are word salad. Guess I’ll have to turn to faux news to get my info now.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: It’s so bad I’m not even kidding. It freezes every time I try to open it, the app layout is so confusing, it limits it’s customers to racist people. I gave it a one star because it’s completely useless. Nobody knows that “Trump 2020” is so stupid and shouldn’t be a thing.
